TFT_Portals_Augments_TripleGold.name: Golden Gala
TFT_Portals_Augments_TripleGold.shortDescription: All augments offered this game will be gold tier.

TFT_Portals_Gold_GoldSubscription.name: Gold Subscription
TFT_Portals_Gold_GoldSubscription.shortDescription: Every stage, gain a random amount of gold. All players gain the same amount.

TFT_Portals_Unique_ScuttlePuddle.name: Scuttle Puddle
TFT_Portals_Unique_ScuttlePuddle.shortDescription: Monsters are replaced by crabs that drop bonus loot!

TFT_Portals_Unique_CrabRave.name: Crab Rave
TFT_Portals_Unique_CrabRave.shortDescription: Monsters are replaced by crabs that drop bonus loot! Giant crabs are VERY DANGEROUS.

TFT_Portals_Items_ArtifactAnvil.name: Artifact Anvil
TFT_Portals_Items_ArtifactAnvil.shortDescription: Start with 1 Artifact anvil (choose a powerful item).

TFT_Portals_Augments_PrismaticFirst.name: Prismatic Prelude
TFT_Portals_Augments_PrismaticFirst.shortDescription: The first augment offered this game will be prismatic tier.

TFT_Portals_Augments_PrismaticThird.name: Prismatic Finale
TFT_Portals_Augments_PrismaticThird.shortDescription: The last augment offered this game will be prismatic tier.

TFT_Portals_Augments_TriplePrismatic.name: Prismatic Party
TFT_Portals_Augments_TriplePrismatic.shortDescription: All augments offered this game will be prismatic tier.

TFT_Portals_Unique_WanderingTrainers.name: Trainer Golems
TFT_Portals_Unique_WanderingTrainers.shortDescription: Start with a Golem with 3 permanently attached emblems.

TFT_Portals_Unique_LootSubscription.name: Loot Subscription
TFT_Portals_Unique_LootSubscription.shortDescription: Every stage, gain random loot from a highly varied pool.

TFT_Portals_Unique_LuckyShops.name: HACK: Lucky Shops
TFT_Portals_Unique_LuckyShops.shortDescription: Once per stage, a lucky shop tailored to your traits can appear!

TFT_Portals_Unique_SentinelArmory.name: HACK: Golem Armory
TFT_Portals_Unique_SentinelArmory.shortDescription: Pick a Golem unit with 1 of 3 combat roles at the end of stage 4!

TFT_Portals_Unique_TwoStarShops.name: HACK: Two-Star Shops
TFT_Portals_Unique_TwoStarShops.shortDescription: Two-star units can appear in your shop!

TFT_Portals_Unique_HackedTreasureArmory.name: HACK: Treasure Armory
TFT_Portals_Unique_HackedTreasureArmory.shortDescription: The Stage 4 NPC round is replaced with a rerollable Treasure Armory!

TFT_Portals_Unique_FourthAugment.name: HACK: Fourth Augment
TFT_Portals_Unique_FourthAugment.shortDescription: There will be an extra augment round at the end of stage 4!

TFT_Portals_Unique_AugmentRoundSwap.name: HACK: Augment Round Swap
TFT_Portals_Unique_AugmentRoundSwap.shortDescription: The augment rounds have been moved earlier this game.

TFT_Portals_Unique_FourthAugmentStage2.name: HACK: Fourth Augment
TFT_Portals_Unique_FourthAugmentStage2.shortDescription: There will be an extra augment round in stage 2!

TFT_Portals_Unique_FourthAugmentStage3.name: HACK: Fourth Augment
TFT_Portals_Unique_FourthAugmentStage3.shortDescription: There will be an extra augment round at the end of stage 3!

TFT_Portals_Unique_FourthAugmentStage5.name: HACK: Fourth Augment
TFT_Portals_Unique_FourthAugmentStage5.shortDescription: There will be an extra augment round at the start of stage 5!

TFT_Portals_Unique_EggArmory.name: HACK: Egg Armory
TFT_Portals_Unique_EggArmory.shortDescription: Pick an egg with 1 of 3 hatching times at the start of Stage 4!

TFT_Portals_Unique_FourthAugment_HR_Stag.name: HACK: Fourth Augment
TFT_Portals_Unique_FourthAugment_HR_Stag.shortDescription: There will be an extra augment round at the start of stage 4!

TFT_Portals_Unique_FourthAugment_HR_Stag.name: HACK: Fourth Augment
TFT_Portals_Unique_FourthAugment_HR_Stag.shortDescription: There will be an extra augment round at the start of stage 6!

TFT_Portals_Unique_FourthAugment_HR_Stag.name: HACK: Fourth Augment
TFT_Portals_Unique_FourthAugment_HR_Stag.shortDescription: There will be an extra augment round at the end of stage 7!

TFT_Portals_Unique_HackedTreasureArmory_.name: HACK: Treasure Armory
TFT_Portals_Unique_HackedTreasureArmory_.shortDescription: The Stage 8 NPC round is replaced with a rerollable Treasure Armory!

TFT_Portals_Unique_LootSubscription_HR.name: Loot Subscription
TFT_Portals_Unique_LootSubscription_HR.shortDescription: Every other stage, gain random loot from a highly varied pool.

TFT_Portals_Unique_RerollSector.name: HACK: Reroll Subscription
TFT_Portals_Unique_RerollSector.shortDescription: At the start of every stage, gain free Shop rerolls.

TFT_Portals_Unique_EggArmory_HR.name: HACK: Egg Armory
TFT_Portals_Unique_EggArmory_HR.shortDescription: Pick an egg with 1 of 3 hatching times at the end of Stage 7!

TFT_Portals_Unique_UpgradedStart.name: HACK: Upgraded Start
TFT_Portals_Unique_UpgradedStart.shortDescription: Begin the game with a 2-star 2-cost champion.

TFT_Portals_Unique_SentinelArmory_HR.name: HACK: Golem Armory
TFT_Portals_Unique_SentinelArmory_HR.shortDescription: Pick a Golem unit with 1 of 3 combat roles at the start of stage 8!

TFT_Portals_Unique_SplittersGalaxy.name: HACK: To Split or Not to Split
TFT_Portals_Unique_SplittersGalaxy.shortDescription: After every Carousel round, players choose how to split a pool of gold.

TFT_Portals_Unique_Invested.name: HACK: P0T 0F G0LD
TFT_Portals_Unique_Invested.shortDescription: After every Carousel round, players vote to split a pot of gold or increase the pot.
